sqlMap.update:
/* BANNER.updateBannerFileInfo */
UPDATE BANNER_INFO SET REAL_FILE_NAME = #real_file_name# , SAVE_FILE_NAME = #save_file_name# , FILE_PATH = #file_path# WHERE BANNER_KEY = #banner_key#

/* BANNER.updateBannerInfo */
UPDATE BANNER_INFO SET MOD_DATE = NOW() , TITLE = #title# , CONTENT = #content# , AREA_CODE = #area_code# , TYPE1 = #type1# , LINK_ADDRESS = #link_address# , IS_NEW_WINDOW = #is_new_window# , ORDER_LEVEL = #order_level# , START_SHOW_DATE = #start_show_date# , END_SHOW_DATE = #end_show_date# , REAL_FILE_NAME = #real_file_name# , SAVE_FILE_NAME = #save_file_name# , FILE_PATH = #file_path# , STATUS = #status# WHERE BANNER_KEY = #banner_key#

/* BANNER.deleteBannerInfo */
UPDATE BANNER_INFO SET MOD_DATE = NOW() , STATUS = 'D' WHERE BANNER_KEY = #banner_key#
sqlMap.select:
/* BANNER.getBannerInfo */
SELECT FROM BANNER_INFO WHERE STATUS IN ('Y','N') AND BANNER_KEY = #banner_key#

/* BANNER.getBannerTotalCount */
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM BANNER_INFO WHERE STATUS IN ('Y','N') AND AREA_CODE = #area_code#

/* BANNER.getBannerList */
SELECT
, CASE WHEN START_SHOW_DATE <= date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND END_SHOW_DATE >= date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_SHOW_YN
FROM BANNER_INFO WHERE STATUS IN ('Y','N') AND AREA_CODE = #area_code# ORDER BY ORDER_LEVEL ASC LIMIT #recordRowNum# , #pageSize#

/* BANNER.getMainBannerList */
SELECT FROM BANNER_INFO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND AREA_CODE = #area_code#
AND START_SHOW_DATE <= date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND END_SHOW_DATE >= date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY ORDER_LEVEL ASC
